Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of . This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor looks first to the specified `style` for the values of its <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlLayout.Align%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlLayout.Wrap%2A> properties. If these properties are not set in the `style`, this constructor uses the corresponding properties from the specified `currentLayout`.

Docs.summary: Sets or returns the alignment. The default value is . This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
Docs.value: An enumerated value representing the alignment of the layout.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlMobileTextWriter.WmlLayout.Align%2A> property can be set to any <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Alignment> value.
